revision.text: Possibly: A view of the rise, progress, and present state of the English government in Bengal; including a reply to the misrepresentations of Mr Bolts and other Writers, by Harry Verelst. (London, Printed for J. Nourse, 1772). http://catalogue.nla.gov.au/Record/6056249. Google Books full text at: https://tinyurl.com/yab27c3z .
